    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetectBlackEllipseApp, DetectBlackPolygonApp, VisualizeBinaryContourApp, VisualizeDepthVisualOdometryApp

    public abstract class DemonstrationBase2
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Provides some common basic functionality for demonstrations
    See Also:

      • DemonstrationBase2

        public DemonstrationBase2(java.util.List<?> exampleInputs,
                          boofcv.struct.image.ImageType... defaultTypes)
        Constructor that specifies examples and input image type
        Parameters:
        exampleInputs - List of paths to examples. Either a String file path or PathLabel.
        defaultTypes - Type of image in each stream

      • stopAllInputProcessing

        public void stopAllInputProcessing()
        Blocks until it kills all input streams from running

      • handleInputChange

        protected void handleInputChange(int source,
                                 DemonstrationBase2.InputMethod method,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
        Override to be notified when the input has changed. This is also a good location to change the default max FPS for streaming data. It will be 0 for webcam and 30 FPS for videos
        Parameters:
        method - Type of input source
        width - Width of input image
        height - Height of input image

      • handleInputClose

        protected void handleInputClose(int source)
        A streaming source of images has closed.
        Parameters:
        source -

      • processImage

        public abstract void processImage(int sourceID,
                                  long frameID,
                                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffered,
                                  boofcv.struct.image.ImageBase input)
        Process the image. Will be called in its own thread, but doesn't need to be re-entrant. If image is null then reprocess the previous image.

      • openFile

        public void openFile(java.io.File file)
        Opens a file. First it will attempt to open it as an image. If that fails it will try opening it as a video. If all else fails tell the user it has failed. If a streaming source was running before it will be stopped.

      • openVideo

        protected void openVideo(java.lang.String... filePaths)
        Before invoking this function make sure waitingToOpenImage is false AND that the previous input has beens topped

      • openImage

        protected void openImage(java.lang.String filePath,
                         java.awt.image.BufferedImage buffered)

      • openWebcam

        public void openWebcam()

      • waitUntilInputSizeIsKnown

        public void waitUntilInputSizeIsKnown()
        waits until the processing thread is done.

      • enterPausedState

        protected void enterPausedState()

      • reprocessInput

        public void reprocessInput()
        If just a single image was processed it will process it again. If it's a stream there is no need to reprocess, the next image will be handled soon enough.

      • reprocessImageOnly

        public void reprocessImageOnly()
        Invokes reprocessInput() only if the input is an IMAGE
